p: The species Plectranthus amboinicus Lour, also known as Plectranthus aromaticus, Coleus aromaticus and Coleus amboinicus, is a herbaceous plant. It is perennial, succulent and aromatic with brittle stems and ovate succulent leaves, an acute apex, toothed edges, and a thick petiole. This species is native to eastern Asia and it is widespread throughout the tropical countries.[ 1]
